newsitem.title: USA: IBM to resell BEA Systems software.
newsitem.headline: IBM to resell BEA Systems software.

text.p: BEA Systems Inc said on Monday International Business Machines Corp's RS/6000 division agreed to resell BEA's transaction software.
Under the deal, IBM will resell BEA's transaction software to run on IBM's RS/6000 line of workstation computers for use in running an enterprise's business operations, BEA said.
BEA said its professional services organization will continue to work with the IBM RS/6000 division to deliver consulting, training, and integration services on BEA's product suite.
Shares of BEA gained 1-5/8 to 21-5/8, while IBM gained 9/16 to 105-1/2.
